name: EMC
description:
EMC is an experimental game inspired by the wonderful world of nuclear physics.
The player has to avoid nuclear fusion whilst splitting the electrons. Simple to start with, but with every level the electrons get faster and numerous. This science is addictive.

*** Winner of the FWA Mobile Award ***

"EMC is a successful experiment."
– 148Apps

EMC features:
• Unlimited Levels
• Tutorial
• High Score
